name: DPAPI Domain Backup Key Extraction
description: Detects tools extracting LSA secret DPAPI domain backup key from Domain Controllers
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4662 AND winlog.event_data.ObjectType:/[Ss][Ee][Cc][Rr][Ee][Tt][Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt]/ AND winlog.event_data.AccessMask:/0[Xx]2/ AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:/.*[Bb][Cc][Kk][Uu][Pp][Kk][Ee][Yy].*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4662 AND winlog.event_data.ObjectType:SecretObject AND winlog.event_data.AccessMask:0x2 AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:*BCKUPKEY*)`
